amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide an additional $33.4 million for advanced subsonic technology and strike language prohibiting the use of funds for concept studies for advanced traffic management and affordable design and manufacturing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to restore $33.4 million in authorized funding in the bill for the Advanced Subsonic Technology research.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 139 - 281 (Roll no. 701).
